mobileResponsivenessTip: Ensure touch targets are larger and easy to interact with on smaller screens.
loadingSpeedTip: Optimize images and reduce unnecessary JavaScript to improve page load times.
seoOptimizationTip: Add more content with relevant keywords on the homepage for better SEO performance.
userExperienceTip: Provide clearer navigation and easier access to important information like room availability.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking steps and reduce the number of fields to improve the booking experience.
tips: Improve website accessibility for users with disabilities.
Enhance site security to provide better trust signals for users.
whatThisWebsiteDoesInOneLine: We found that your website promotes and facilitates bookings for Radio Hotel, a boutique hotel in New York City.
